revision.text:
__FORCETOC__ '''Events''' are limited-time durations in which players are given the chance to capture unique Pokémon. Events usually occur in conjunction with real-world holidays (e.g. Halloween, Christmas), or coincide with the anniversary of important events in the Pokémon franchise (e.g. release of the first movie, release of ''Pokémon GO''). In most cases, the special Pokémon are added to region [[Roaming Pokémon|Roamer]] pools.
=== List of Events ===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Event !! Unlock Time !! Event Pokémon !! Where to find event Pokémon !! Other Pokémon |- | Lunar New Year || January 24 - February 7 || [[File:Vivillon_(Fancy).png|50px]] Vivillon (Fancy) || Added as a Roaming Pokémon in [[Kalos]] || <center>--- |- | Flying Pikachu || July 6 - 12 || [[File:Flying Pikachu.png|50px]] Flying Pikachu || Added as a Roaming Pokémon in [[Kanto]] || <center>--- |- | rowspan=4|Armored Mewtwo || rowspan=4|July 18 - 24 || [[File:Armored Mewtwo.png|50px]] Armored Mewtwo || Added as a Dungeon Boss Pokémon in [[Cerulean Cave]] || rowspan=4| Bulbasaur (clone), Charmander (clone), and Squirtle (clone) will level evolve into the clone versions of their evolutions. |- | [[File:Bulbasaur_(clone).png|50px]] Bulbasaur (clone) || rowspan=3|All Clone Pokémon added as roaming Pokémon in [[Kanto]] |- | [[File:Charmander_(clone).png|50px]] Charmander (clone) |- | [[File:Squirtle_(clone).png|50px]] Squirtle (clone) |- | rowspan=3|Halloween || rowspan=3|Oct 30 - Nov 5 || [[File:Spooky Bulbasaur.png|50px]] Spooky Bulbasaur || Added to random [[Kanto]] Route Pokémon pools || [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly added to random [[Kanto]] Route Pokémon pools |- | [[File:Spooky Togepi.png|50px]] Spooky Togepi || Added to random [[Johto]] Route Pokémon pools || [[File:Misdreavus.png|40px]] Misdreavus added to random [[Johto]] Route Pokémon pools |- | [[File:Pikachu(Gengar).png|50px]] Pikachu (Gengar) || Added to random [[Hoenn]] Route Pokémon pools || [[File:Shuppet.png|40px]],[[File:Duskull.png|40px]] Shuppet and Duskull added to random [[Hoenn]] Route Pokémon pools |- | rowspan=2|Let's GO! || rowspan=2|November 16-23 || [[File:Let's_Go_Eevee.png|50px]] Let's Go Eevee || rowspan=2|Both added as Roaming Pokémon in [[Kanto]] || rowspan=2|<center> --- |- | [[File:Let's_Go_Pikachu.png|50px]] Let's Go Pikachu |- | rowspan=3|Christmas || rowspan=3|Dec 24 - 30 || [[File:Santa_Snorlax.png|50px]] Santa Snorlax || Added as a Roaming Pokémon in all [[Regions]] || rowspan=3|<center> --- |- | [[File:Elf_Munchlax.png|50px]] '''Elf Munchlax*''' || Breed Santa Snorlax [[File:Santa_Snorlax.png|50px]] |- | [[File:Grinch_Celebi.png|50px]] Grinch Celebi || Added as a Dungeon Boss Pokémon in [[Ilex Forest]] |- |}
'''*Note:''' Elf Munchlax can be obtained at any time by breeding Santa Snorlax, it is not only obtainable during the event.
=== Suggestions for New Events ===
We are always looking for new ideas for events to be implemented in the future. Suggestions can be submitted on the [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Pokéclicker Discord].
[[Category:Unique Pokémon]] [[Category:Pokémon]]
